en: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
They who are during their prayer humbly intent
And they who turn away from ill speech
And they who are observant of zakah
And they who guard their private parts

ar: إِلَّا عَلَى أَزْوَجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَنُهُمْ
en: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess,
for indeed, they will not be blamed -
